section:
A huge golden-skinned snake dangles from the bough in front of you. A green gem is set into the middle of its head. As this burns against the twilight, you hear a voice in your mind, all cold hisses and dripping with predatory nuance: Hear me, mortal. You seek adventure? Hazards hold no terror for you? Then submit to my wager...
Accept the snake’s wager Attack it Run off
